name: eRS-BookAppointment-Operation-1
description: To book an appointment slot for a referral of a patient.

parameter.name: slotId
parameter.documentation: The identifier for this slot.  The namespace for this identifier is "https://fhir.nhs.uk/Id/ers-slot-identifier".

parameter.name: intentionToAddReferralLetter
parameter.documentation: Intention to add a referral letter.

parameter.name: referral
parameter.documentation: The referral request that has just been updated.
